EmailTemplate.subject: Reach more customers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Whether you sell on a your own website, in marketplaces or in-store, BigCommerce makes selling on multiple sales channels effortless. Seamlessly add and manage new channels Learn More <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/introducing-channel-manager/?&utm_source=product&utm_medium=email"]]> Introducing the BigCommerce Channel Manager Adding new online sales channels can significantly boost your exposure and grow your revenue. But until now, managing additional channels has meant dealing with multiple listings, overselling and data entry errors.
The new BigCommerce Channel Manager makes selling on multiple channels effortless. Connect your store to social media and marketplaces with just a few clicks. No matter what channel a sale comes from, you can process, fulfill and track it from your BigCommerce dashboard. Sell directly on Facebook and Pinterest
Channel Manager currently supports Facebook and Pinterest, and more channels will be coming later this year.
Facebook Shop
Add a Shop section to your Facebook Page and showcase your products to more than 1 billion users. Learn more <[[http://www.bigcommerce.com/facebook-shop/]]>
Pinterest Buyable Pins
Let shoppers browse, pin and buy your products without ever leaving Pinterest. Learn more <[[http://www.bigcommerce.com/pinterest]]> Learn More <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/introducing-channel-manager/?&utm_source=product&utm_medium=email]]>
